debug_text.text: 'found player-owned ship %s %s %s in sector %s.'.[@$targetship.idcode, @$targetship.knownname, $targetship, @$targetship.sector.knownname]
'no player-owned ship found. no action.'
'found player-owned ship is a unit. no action.'
'found player-owned ship is not in a sector. no action.'
'found player-owned ship in a highway. no action'
'found player-owned ship does not have a pilot. no action'
'found player-owned ship is flown by the player. no action'
'ship is exploring. accumulated points: %s'.[$spawnchance]
'closest big thing is %s %s %s, %sm away from playership. (may be null)'.[@$closestbigthing.idcode, @$closestbigthing.knownname, $closestbigthing, @$ship.distanceto.{$closestbigthing}]
'ship is away from closest station. accumulated points: %s'.[$spawnchance]
'ship has no commander and no subordinates. accumulated points: %s'.[$spawnchance]
'ship is not a capital ship. accumulated points: %s'.[$spawnchance]
'ship is a scout ship. accumulated points: %s'.[$spawnchance]
'ship is not doing nothing. accumulated points: %s'.[$spawnchance]
'ship is sitting still or has no order. accumulated points: %s'.[$spawnchance]
'skill factor: %s. average lockbox dist: %sm, crew skill: %s'.[$skillfactor, $averagelockboxdistinsector, $ship.combinedskill]
'total points, capped at 100: %s'.[$spawnchance]
'lockbox %s has a bounding box with size %sm'.[$lockboxmacro, $radius]

player.age + ': lockbox: %s %s %s spawned at some point %sm away from %s %s %s in sector %s'.[$lockboxmacro, @$lockbox.knownname, $lockbox, $offset, @$ship.idcode, @$ship.knownname, $ship, @$ship.sector.knownname]
player.age + ': lockbox %s cleaned up.'.[$lockbox]
player.age + ': lockbox %s is visible. checking to clean up later.'.[$lockbox]
'lockbox %s just dramatically regurgitated its contents. cleaning up instance.'.[$lockbox]
'lockbox %s destroyed. cleaning up instance.'.[$lockbox]
